```{r metathis, echo=FALSE}
library(metathis)
meta() %>%
  meta_name("github-repo" = "Tai-Rocha/Tai-Rocha_CV.github.io") %>% 
  meta_social(
    title = "Tainá Rocha CV",
    description = paste(
      "CV made with the packages RMarkdown, pagedown, datadrivencv and googlesheet4"
    ),
    url = "https://github.com/Tai-Rocha/Tai-Rocha_CV.github.io/cv.html",
    image = "https://beatrizmilz.github.io/resume/img/share-card.png",
    image_alt = paste(
      "Tainá Rocha CV"
    ),
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = "Tainá Rocha",
    twitter_card_type = "summary_large_image",
    twitter_creator = "@beamilz"
  )
```

}
</style>")
}

Main
================================================================================

Tainá Rocha {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

<div style="text-align: justify"> I am a researcher working on patterns of biodiversity distribution, focusing on the impacts of global change (climate change and land-use and land-cover change). My recent interests and researches comprise: __1.__ Analysis of climate data and land use and land cover data under different scenarios of climate change, __2.__ Spatial analysisof species diversity (alpha and beta diversity), __3.__ Ecological niche models/speciesdistribution models and other niche analyses to assess the impacts of global change onbiodiversity, __4.__ Biogeographical patterns and evolutionary history in the Neotropics.Note:I use open-source tools and platforms. I am interested in good practices about open science (open databases, open software, etc.), good workflows, reproducibility and FAIR principles. </div>
